charges.charge_disposition: The defendant is hereby placed on probation for a term of three (3) years (expiration of probation will be July 7, 1997). The defendant shall comply with the following special conditions: 1. Defendant to serve a term of four (4) months home confinement. Terms and conditions to be scheduled by the Probation Department. 2. Defendant to make restitution as to the remaining amount of $7,475.00. The proation Department is directed to set the amounts and intervals in a fashion that afford defendant a reasonable opportunity to pay yet without undo hardship that might prejudice good faith efforts at compliance. (1)
